strapiPost.title: Airship Coffee Opening New Location
strapiPost.content:
Airship Coffee in Bentonville has plans for a new location and anticipates a grand opening in early spring next year. 

  • Neighborhood cafe: The new shop will be in what was originally a 1950s pump station for the entire city’s water supply. So naturally, the third Airship will be Airship “at the Pumphouse.” The design for the new space incorporates a mixture of mid-century, 1980s, and steampunk styles. 
  • Get pumped: Airship at the Pumphouse will be characterized by its proximity to trails and outdoor spaces while including unique spaces within. It will be a “multilevel café and bar with a strong, humans-on-bicycles appeal.” Get excited for the pumphouse’s micro pump track and more bike-as-transportation incentives coming soon! 

For more details, click HERE.
